title: Tour de France 2013 stage 17 - Embrun to Chorges 32km ITT
description:
Tour de France 2013 stage 17 - Embrun to Chorges, 32km ITT.

UK broadcast by ITV4 started at 1300 GMT, showing riders from GC 39 on (Arnold Jeannesson, France, FDJ, 45:45). 

Split into parts at advert breaks to speed transcode and upload.


The profile doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t do the stage justice, this is a very technical time trial with twisting climbs and descents so hard theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll test bike handling skills of riders and the driving prowess of the manager in the following car. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all set above the Lac de Serre-PonÃƒÂ§on which is a popular windsurfing spot in the Alps meaning if the breeze is up this could be even harder for the riders.

(profile pic and description from inrng.com/tour/#Stage17)


SD broadcast, encapsulated 16:9, 576i, 25fps at ~2500kbps transcoded by ffmpeg/x264 to 576p with settings -c:v libx264 -crf 23 -preset veryfast -vf "yadif=0:-1:0" -c:a libfdk_aac -ab 64000 -ac 2.
